Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway/Lelion Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Lelion Way and Lankshire Parkway.
Room.LongDescription: Lankshire Parkway runs south from Lelion Way, which continues to the east and west. On the north side of the intersection, you can see Lyanden Lake and the island which the Lyanden Castle is built on. The swamp-like river area on the north side of the road is probably the home to numerous animals, including a few species of alligators.
